document_data.name: Royal Historical Office
document_data.mainbody: The '''Royal Historical Office''' of [[Cormyr]] was an extension of the Crown that dealt with the purchase and preservation of cultural and historical artifacts and King [[Azoun Obarskyr IV]]'s personal collections in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Organization: The Royal Historical Office was under the direct control of the Crown of Cormyr and employed sergeants in charge of procuring.
document_data.Activities: The Royal Historical Office often worked with respectable adventurers and expeditions that operated out of [[Suzail]] to procure items of historical importance. The [[Society of Stalwart Adventurers]] was one of the organizations that the Royal Historical Office did business with.
document_data.History: In [[1362 DR]],{{Cite web/Presenting...Seven Millennia of Realms Fiction}} the Royal Historical Office purchased the majority of items and artifacts recovered by [[Artus Cimber]] and [[Hydel Pontifax]] from their expedition to the [[Stonelands]] where they encountered a strange [[silver]] statue of [[Mulhorand]]i origin, along with ancient [[coin]]s and [[spear]]heads.
